attributes.action: Same NHS Cancer Treatment in Wales as England (5x more likely to get life saving drugs in England)
attributes.additional_details:
Cancer sufferers in Wales are 5 x less likely than those in England to recieve life extending treatment. UK Government 'Cancer' drugs fund set up a £200million budget for those living in England but not Wales? Any concerns?  Why does England get the life saving drugs and not Wales ??

Equal rights for Cancer suffers in Wales.  Don't put budgets before people.
